医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的西班牙语网站旨在消除中风差异虽然中风是美国第五大死因，但它对西班牙裔人的影响尤为严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-Spanish-language-website-aims-to-combat-中风-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-Spanish-language-website-aims-to-combat-中风-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df955bd9-08e8-4874-a090-4500efee05e1 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 14:16:08 -0400 New Spanish language website aims to combat stroke disparities
胰岛素基因替代 DNA 形状的第一个晶体结构被揭示伦敦大学学院领导的研究小组揭示了胰岛素基因另一种 DNA 形状的第一个晶体结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/First-crystal-struct-of-alternative-DNA-shape-from-the-insulin-gene-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/First-crystal-struct-of-alternative-DNA-shape-from-the-insulin-gene-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a3aa80d-540f-4f1b-9079-92ec8d440c06 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 13:30:00 -0400 First crystal structure of alternative DNA shape from the insulin gene revealed
新的化学修饰减少了 siRNA 药物的脱靶效应小干扰 RNA (siRNA) 药物是一类沉默与遗传性疾病相关的特定基因的治疗药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-chemical-modification-reduces-off-target-effects-in-siRNA-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-chemical-modification-reduces-off-target-effects-in-siRNA-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4674690-fa29-4d68-8751-1caa639b9940 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 13:12:03 -0400 New chemical modification reduces off-target effects in siRNA drugs
瑞典报告 50 岁以下人群皮肤癌发病率下降一项新的研究表明，瑞典患皮肤癌、恶性黑色素瘤的风险似乎正在下降——至少在 50 岁以下的人群中是这样。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Sweden-reports-drop-in-skin-cancer-rates-for-under-50s.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Sweden-reports-drop-in-skin-cancer-rates-for-under-50s.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=346bc50f-fa28-4fd6-a4bd-89030bdb6f87 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 12:54:06 -0400 Sweden reports drop in skin cancer rates for under 50s
ChatGPT 在呼吸系统疾病评估方面优于见习医生在奥地利维也纳举行的欧洲呼吸学会 (ERS) 大会上发表的一项研究中，聊天机器人 ChatGPT 在评估囊性纤维化、哮喘和胸部感染等领域的复杂呼吸系统疾病病例方面表现优于见习医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/ChatGPT-outperforms-trainee-doctors-in-respiratory-disease-assessments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/ChatGPT-outperforms-trainee-doctors-in-respiratory-disease-assessments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2621aa42-fbc8-42aa-b418-dbe8d343c500 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 12:45:10 -0400 ChatGPT outperforms trainee doctors in respiratory disease assessments
社交媒体影响者提高了尼古丁产品对年轻人的吸引力昆士兰大学的研究发现，接触认可尼古丁产品的名人和影响者的社交媒体帖子的年轻人更容易吸烟或吸电子烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Social-media-influencers-boost-nicotine-product-appeal-among-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Social-media-influencers-boost-nicotine-product-appeal-among-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a96d608f-945d-41d0-8ecf-a6f12926d5e2 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 12:41:12 -0400 Social media influencers boost nicotine product appeal among youth
手术前后的免疫治疗对 NSCLC 患者有益约翰·霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心研究人员的一项新分析显示，可手术的非小细胞肺癌患者在手术前和手术后接受免疫治疗，而不是仅在手术前接受治疗，在未来几年中可能会表现得更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Immunotherapy-before-and-after-surgery-benefits-NSCLC-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Immunotherapy-before-and-after-surgery-benefits-NSCLC-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e08a8919-76f8-4201-9a7c-931829de13a7 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 12:37:30 -0400 Immunotherapy before and after surgery benefits NSCLC patients
电子烟与年轻人运动表现下降有关根据在奥地利维也纳举行的欧洲呼吸学会（ERS）大会上发表的一项研究，在旨在衡量运动能力的测试中，吸电子烟的年轻人比不吸电子烟的年轻人表现更差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Vaping-linked-to-lower-exercise-performance-in-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Vaping-linked-to-lower-exercise-performance-in-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b43328ee-7d28-41ef-9551-2f6cb5383816 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 12:32:19 -0400 Vaping linked to lower exercise performance in young people
研究将空气污染和有限的绿地与较高的呼吸道住院风险联系起来奥地利维也纳欧洲呼吸学会 (ERS) 大会上发表的一项研究表明，长期暴露在空气污染中和缺乏绿色空间会增加因呼吸系统疾病住院的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Study-links-air-pollution-and-limited-green-spaces-to-higher-respiratory-hospitalization-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Study-links-air-pollution-and-limited-green-spaces-to-higher-respiratory-hospitalization-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ac50de5-b363-4f7d-8aaf-ba9f6f3d969f Mon, 09 Sep 2024 12:27:19 -0400 Study links air pollution and limited green spaces to higher respiratory hospitalization risk
揭示了肺癌免疫治疗中预测生物标志物的有前途的途径今天在国际肺癌研究协会 2024 年世界肺癌大会上发表的一项研究证明了开发免疫检查点抑制剂预测生物标志物的一条有希望的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Promising-pathway-for-predictive-biomarkers-in-lung-cancer-immunotherapy-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Promising-pathway-for-predictive-biomarkers-in-lung-cancer-immunotherapy-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=952460e1-c1f3-4a0b-95fc-29a5d83b76bc Mon, 09 Sep 2024 12:19:00 -0400 Promising pathway for predictive biomarkers in lung cancer immunotherapy revealed
